text: This intermediate Mandarin article is about seasons (季节).一年有四个季节，春天、夏天、秋天和冬天。我最喜欢的季节是夏天和冬天。因为夏天很热，我们可以在大海里游泳，还可以和朋友们一起去旅游。虽然冬天很冷，但是会下雪。我们可以堆雪人和滑雪，真好玩啊！There are four seasons a year, spring, summer, autumn and winter.My favorite seasons are  summer and winter. Because the summer is very hot, we can swim in the sea and go on a trip with friends.Although it is very cold in winter, it will snow. We can make snowmen and ski, how fun!1 – 我最喜欢哪两个季节？a. 春天和秋天b. 夏天和秋天c. 夏天和冬天d. 春天和冬天2 – 冬天可以干什么？a. 游泳b. 跑步c. 旅游和游泳d. 堆雪人和滑雪1. c2. dReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
